name: Dosa
description: A thin, crispy crepe made from fermented rice and lentils, filled with your choice of flavorful stuffing. Served hot with tangy chutneys and sambar, perfect for a savory South Indian delight

name: Medu Vada
description: A crispy, golden doughnut-shaped fritter made from spiced lentil batter, deep-fried to perfection. Served hot with chutneys and sambar, perfect for a crunchy, savory treat.

name: Corn Pizza
description: A moist and decadent chocolate cake layered with rich chocolate ganache. Perfect for chocolate lovers!

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves. Simple yet delicious!

name: Tandoori Soya Chaap
description: Tender soya chunks marinated in flavorful spices and grilled to smoky perfection in a tandoor. Served with tangy chutneys, perfect for a hearty and protein-packed treat.

name: Malai Soya Chaap
description: Creamy soya chaap marinated in rich, mildly spiced cream sauce, grilled to a melt-in-your-mouth texture. Served with chutneys for a luscious, velvety bite.

name: Pasta
description: Deliciously creamy or tangy pasta cooked to perfection with fresh herbs, vegetables, and your choice of sauce. Served hot, perfect for a comforting and flavorful meal.

name: Noodles
description: Stir-fried noodles tossed with fresh vegetables, aromatic spices, and your choice of protein. Served hot and bursting with flavor, perfect for a quick and tasty meal.
